skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: numbers guru
des:
1. Enable the skill.
2. Begin the skill by saying, Alexa, start numbers guru.
3. Choose the difficulty level (Easy, Medium or Hard)
4. Alexa will begin the questions, reply answers with numbers
5. Alexa will keep track of your score as you go. And also highest score. 
6. While skill in in progress, You can say following, 
i. 'I don't know' to skip a question, 
ii. 'Repeat' to hear the question again, 
iii.'start over' or 'restart' to restart the session. (This will reset your score too)
iv.'Stop' to end the session,
vi.'What is my score' to know your ongoing sessions score
'vii.change my level to <easy> or <medium> or <hard> ' this will change difficulty level of the session on the go.
viii.' Help'. to understand the skill better. 
Alexa will respond accordingly for above key words. 
7. Ultimate math skill for Alexa. Unlimited math questions.
8. Provide feed back to improve this skill. Will add them as required.

few hacks --
***Always say Repeat to hear the question again or to gain more time to answer. ***
*** Repeat or saying don't know are not counted for scores***
*** In each level, questions starts easier, the skill smartly changes the difficulty level within each level.***

Reply your answers to the questions with numbers for all kind of questions including word problems. 
Example 3 Pens + 4 Pens = 7.
Keeps track of highest score.
